title: Truth lifting up its head above scandals Wherein is declared what God Christ Father Son Holy Ghost Scriptures Gospel Prayer Ordinances of God are. By Gerrard Winstanly.
author: Winstanley, Gerrard, b. 1609.
notes: The words "God ... Ordinances of God" are connected on title page by a system of brackets.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
